The video shows a street row with people: 3. At the seven-second mark, a man in a newsboy cap throws what appears to be a dead body out of a vehicle and onto another one.
The post: s caption translates to English as "New York / A funeral director received a 'bad cheque'. He was furious and hurled the dead body onto the family's car, which caused a fight between the two parties. #DoNotIssueBadCheque".
